texto_completo:
ENUNCIADO: In openEuler, the permissions on a file are "-rw-rw-r--". Which of the following statements are true about this file?
ITENS:
A) It is a directory file  
B) The file owner can read and write the file  
ITEM CORRETO: B  
EXPLICAÇÃO: As permissões indicam que o proprietário pode ler e escrever no arquivo.
enunciado: In openEuler, the permissions on a file are "-rw-rw-r--". Which of the following statements are true about this file?

itens.B: The file owner can read and write the file

explicacao: As permissões indicam que o proprietário pode ler e escrever no arquivo.
